H0.text: The country Myanmar is still known in many parts of the world by what prior name. Burma

H1.text: The country Myanmar is still known in many parts of the world by what prior name. Mandalay

H2.text: The country Myanmar is still known in many parts of the world by what prior name. Rangoon

H3.text: The country Myanmar is still known in many parts of the world by what prior name. Birma

A4.text: Many political and ethnic opposition groups and countries continue to use Burma because they do not recognise the legitimacy or authority of the military government.

A5.text: In English, the country is popularly known as either Burma or Myanmar.
